name: Innovation
description: The uniqueness and originality of the startup's idea or product.

name: Market Potential
description: The size and growth potential of the target market.

name: Team Expertise
description: The skills and experience of the founding team.

name: Execution Plan
description: The well-defined strategy and plan for bringing the idea to market.

name: Financial Viability
description: The ability of the startup to generate revenue and achieve profitability.
